00050         inline double GetSampleVolt( int i){ return (double)( this->GetSample( i))* this->m_bit_2_volt;};
00051         inline int GetSample( int i){ return (int)((( int)this->m_p_sample_buffer[i])<< this->m_sample_shift)- 0x8000;};
